def main():
    """
    Main function
    """
    start_time = input().split(":")
    end_time = input().split(":")
    start_time = [int(i) for i in start_time]
    end_time = [int(i) for i in end_time]
    start_time = start_time[0]*60 + start_time[1]
    end_time = end_time[0]*60 + end_time[1]
    mid_time = (start_time + end_time)//2
    mid_time = [mid_time//60, mid_time%60]
    print("{:02d}:{:02d}".format(mid_time[0], mid_time[1]))

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

#-----Solution-----

#This solution is not the best one. It is just a quick solution.

#Get the first time
h1, m1 = map(int, input().split(':'))
#Get the second time
h2, m2 = map(int, input().split(':'))

#Get the total minutes of the first time
minutes1 = h1 * 60 + m1
#Get the total minutes of the second time
minutes2 = h2 * 60 + m2

#Get the total minutes of the contest
total_minutes = minutes2 - minutes1

#Get the midpoint of the contest
midpoint = total_minutes // 2

#Get the hours of the midpoint
hours = midpoint // 60
#Get the minutes of the midpoint
minutes = midpoint % 60

#Print the midpoint
print(f'{hours:02}:{minutes:02}')
